post_detail.description:
Challenge:

ClickFireMedia was challenged by Card Cubby to redesign their website.

Execution:

CFM reworked the user experience and design of Card Cubby’s site. The new design features a simplified layout, which highlighted the site’s content in a more engaging, concise and user-friendly manner. The site featured calls-to-actions to their products as well as ample social media integration. CFM also oversaw the Web development process and helped with Card Cubby's marketing efforts.
post_detail.title: Card Cubby
